meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the February 6, 2025 City Plan Commission Hearing, the February 13, 2025 Special Called City Plan Commission Hearing, and the February 20, 2025 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Various zoning cases under advisement requiring discussion.

agenda_items.title: Building Line Removal
agenda_items.description: Consideration of an application to remove a platted building line.

agenda_items.title: P&D Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending the Dallas Development Code.

agenda_items.title: Authorization of a Hearing
agenda_items.description: Consideration of authorizing public hearings for various amendments.

agenda_items.title: Other Matters
agenda_items.description: Consideration of appointments to CPC committees.
